entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to snow this evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
